title: Sooravalida Song Lyrics Maruthu
stanzas:
Sooravalida Song Lyrics Maruthu
#DImman #JineshPrabhu

sooraavalida
naanga thottaale seerum pulida
yeri adida
ooru onnaaga vaettu vedidaa (2)

puzhudhi odamboda aadumada kaalu
ezhudhi maalaathu enga varalaaru

vaal eduthu vagidueduthu
seevum seemada
enga thekku thisaikaaranukku
pullum vaaluda

nimindhu ninna karudhu
nermaiyinna marudhu (2)

sooraavalida
naanga thottaale seerum pulida
yeri adida
ooru onnaaga vaettu vedidaa (2)

kaattu panamaramaa
karuppaa odambirukkum
aanaalum enga manam vella vella

mootta mudhukilathaan
nethamum somandhiduvom
aanaalum baaram enga nenjil illa

kaaichi pona enga
kaiyilathaan regai illa
aanaalum kavala illa

naanga nethiyila
poosugira manna vida
thiruneeru usanthathilla

thalaimela ganathathaan
yethi vaippom
aana thalaikkulla
ganathathaan yaetha maattom

nimindhu ninna karudhu
nermaiyinna marudhu (2)

sooraavalida
naanga thottaale seerum pulida
yeri adida
ooru onnaaga vaettu vedidaa

jalli kattu kaala
ithu thaakkumadi aala
vetti vambu senja
ivan katta vaippaan sela

mathaappo poo pola
pongi sirippaane
kithaappu kaattaama
kotti koduppaane

nananja pana pola valathithaan
nalla manasu mala pola osathithaan

sattaiyila azhukkkirukkum
savadaalu neranjirukkum
aanaalum naanga romba gethu gethu

vervai velichahtula
irutta thorathiduvom
maaraatha anbu enga sothu sothu

summa sandithanam panni
varum salli paiyan
kuthikaalu narambeduppom

ooru ponnugala
kevalama sonnavana
boli pottu vaginthiduvom

aathaaram ammanu aasa vaippom
ava kaappaathum
saaminnu poosa vaippom

nimindhu ninna karudhu
nermaiyinna marudhu (4)
sooraavalidaa..

seo.title: Sooravalida Song Lyrics Maruthu
seo.description: Get the complete Sooravalida Song Lyrics Maruthu from Maruthu. Read the lyrics penned by Yugabharathi and composed by D Imman and sung by Jinesh Prabhu. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Yugabharathi, Maruthu, D Imman, Jinesh Prabhu, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
